verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came also unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> thee a wife <S%H802><s%>, neither shalt thou have sons <S%H1121><s%> or daughters <S%H1323><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> concerning the sons <S%H1121><s%> and concerning the daughters <S%H1323><s%> that are born <S%H3205><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>, and concerning their mothers <S%H517><s%> that bare <S%H3205><s%> them, and concerning their fathers <S%H1><s%> that begat <S%H3209><s%> them in this land <S%H776><s%>;

They shall die <S%H4191><s%> of grievous <S%H8463><s%> deaths <S%H4463><s%>; they shall not be lamented <S%H5594><s%>; neither shall they be buried <S%H6912><s%>; but they shall be as dung <S%H1828><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>: and they shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and by famine <S%H7458><s%>; and their carcases <S%H5038><s%> shall be meat <S%H3978><s%> for the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and for the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Enter <S%H935><s%> not into the house <S%H1004><s%> of mourning <S%H4798><s%>, neither go <S%H3212><s%> to lament <S%H5594><s%> nor bemoan <S%H5110><s%> them: for I have taken away <S%H622><s%> my peace <S%H7965><s%> from this people <S%H5971><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, even lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and mercies <S%H7356><s%>.

Both the great <S%H1419><s%> and the small <S%H6996><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>: they shall not be buried <S%H6912><s%>, neither shall men lament <S%H5594><s%> for them, nor cut <S%H1413><s%> themselves, nor make themselves bald <S%H7139><s%> for them:

Neither shall men tear <S%H6536><s%> themselves for them in mourning <S%H60><s%>, to comfort <S%H5162><s%> them for the dead <S%H4191><s%>; neither shall men give them the cup <S%H3563><s%> of consolation <S%H8575><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> for their father <S%H1><s%> or for their mother <S%H517><s%>.
Thou shalt not also go <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of feasting <S%H4960><s%>, to sit <S%H3427><s%> with them to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Behold, I will cause to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of this place <S%H4725><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and in your days <S%H3117><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of mirth <S%H8342><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of gladness <S%H8057><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the bride <S%H3618><s%>.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when thou shalt shew <S%H5046><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, and they shall say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Wherefore hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> pronounced <S%H1696><s%> all this great <S%H1419><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against us? or what is our iniquity <S%H5771><s%>? or what is our sin <S%H2403><s%> that we have committed <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>?

Then shalt thou say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Because your fathers <S%H1><s%> have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and have walked <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and have served <S%H5647><s%> them, and have worshipped <S%H7812><s%> them, and have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, and have not kept <S%H8104><s%> my law <S%H8451><s%>;

And ye have done <S%H6213><s%> worse <S%H7489><s%> than your fathers <S%H1><s%>; for, behold <S%H2009><s%>, ye walk <S%H1980><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of his evil <S%H7451><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, that they may not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me:

Therefore will I cast <S%H2904><s%> you out of this land <S%H776><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> that ye know <S%H3045><s%> not, neither ye nor your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and there shall ye serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>; where I will not shew <S%H5414><s%> you favour <S%H2594><s%>.

¶ Therefore, behold, the days <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that it shall no more be said <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, that brought up <S%H5927><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>;

But, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, that brought up <S%H5927><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, and from all the lands <S%H776><s%> whither he had driven <S%H5080><s%> them: and I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> into their land <S%H127><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

¶ Behold, I will send <S%H7971><s%> for many <S%H7227><s%> fishers <S%H1771><s%> <S%H1728><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and they shall fish <S%H1770><s%> them; and after <S%H310><s%> will I send <S%H7971><s%> for many <S%H7227><s%> hunters <S%H6719><s%>, and they shall hunt <S%H6679><s%> them from every mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and from every hill <S%H1389><s%>, and out of the holes <S%H5357><s%> of the rocks <S%H5553><s%>.

For mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> are upon all their ways <S%H1870><s%>: they are not hid <S%H5641><s%> from my face <S%H6440><s%>, neither is their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> hid <S%H6845><s%> from <S%H5048><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And first <S%H7223><s%> I will recompense <S%H7999><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and their sin <S%H2403><s%> double <S%H4932><s%>; because they have defiled <S%H2490><s%> my land <S%H776><s%>, they have filled <S%H4390><s%> mine inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with the carcases <S%H5038><s%> of their detestable <S%H8251><s%> and abominable things <S%H8441><s%>.

O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, my strength <S%H5797><s%>, and my fortress <S%H4581><s%>, and my refuge <S%H4498><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of affliction <S%H6869><s%>, the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto thee from the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and shall say <S%H559><s%>, Surely our fathers <S%H1><s%> have inherited <S%H5157><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%>, vanity <S%H1892><s%>, and things wherein there is no profit <S%H3276><s%>.
Shall a man <S%H120><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> unto himself, and they are no gods <S%H430><s%>?

Therefore, behold, I will this once <S%H6471><s%> cause them to know <S%H3045><s%>, I will cause them to know <S%H3045><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> and my might <S%H1369><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that my name <S%H8034><s%> is The LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
